product_name: Camaro Speedskin Shorty Wetsuit - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Offering efficient insulation plus a short design that's built for speed, the sleeveless men's Camaro Speedskin Shorty wetsuit is ideal for warm-weather open-water sports. Lightweight 2mm Softskin neoprene features a dynamic cut for superior performance; sleeveless design encourages free range of motion for fast, efficient strokes. Above-the-knee coverage is cooler than a full-length wetsuit; smooth-skin seals around armholes and legs help retain warmth and maintain snug fit. Mock-turtleneck opening provides close seal while swimming. Camaro Speedskin Shorty wetsuit features a durable coil back zipper. Closeout.
short_description: Offering efficient insulation plus a short design that's built for speed, the sleeveless men's Camaro Speedskin Shorty wetsuit is ideal for warm-weather open-water sports.
